org.daisy.pipeline.script

Class ScriptRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.daisy.pipeline.script.ScriptRegistry
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ScriptRegistry_SPI

    public class ScriptRegistry
extends Object
    Keeps track of the scripts defined by the loaded modules.
